name: Lower Arch Station
description: On a nearby corner a violin sings; the cadence of its bow dancing in time with the rhythm of your thoughts.
You feel the weight of the bridges above you.
A bridge stretches away to the east.
There is a door at the end of the platform.

name: The Bridge of Sighs
description: You stand on the Bridge of Sighs. A wind blows from below, and it sings as it passes through the latticework of the bridge.
You feel the weight of the bridges above you.
A bridge stretches away to the west.

name: A closed door
description: You stand in front of a closed door. It is made of some kind of hardwood. It looks sturdy.
Lower Arch Station is behind you.
